nodes.text: The Rebel Club was a comic from Star Wars Tales 19 where the basic plots of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and The Breakfast Club were integrated.

Han Solo (Bender), Leia Organa (Claire), Luke Skywalker (Brian), Chewbacca (Allison), and R2-D2 serve detention under Darth Vader (Principal Vernon) for participating in the Rebellion. They eventually escape thanks to the help of Obi-Wan Kenobi (Carl the janitor).
